title: Sequelize
comment: Sequelize is a Node.js ORM used with mysql. It proved good support for db synchronization and is easy to test.

title: dotenv
comment: dotenv is a npm package that allows you to keep your db password safe.  Just create a .env file for your login credentials and reference those values in your server.js file!

title: eslint
comment: eslint is a npm package that helps keep your code clean and fix any errors you may have.
